high_descs: Turn left and move forward, then turn left to go between the couch and the coffee table, then go to the counter ahead.
Pick up the remote from the counter.
Turn left and go to the wall, then turn left and go forward, then turn left to face the coffee table.
Put the remote on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Move the remote to the coffee table.

high_descs: Turn left, walk to fireplace, turn left, walk to dresser on other side of room
Pick up remote control on top of dresser
Turn left, walk to wall, turn left, walk to middle of table, turn left
Place remote control on top of table
tasks.task_desc: Move remote control from dresser to table

high_descs: Turn around and go between the couch and the coffee table, across the living room, to the dresser against the wall.
Pick up the the remote between the watch and the vase, on the dresser.
Turn to your left and go to the wall, then turn left and go to the coffee table on your right.
Place the remote between the statue and the god decoration, on the edge of the table.
tasks.task_desc: Put the remote on the coffee table.

high_descs: Move to the large wooden end table facing the remote on top of the table
Pick up the remote on top of the wooden table
Carry the remote to the coffee table in the middle of the room
Place the remote on top of the coffee table in front of the laptop
tasks.task_desc: Carry a remote to the coffee table

high_descs: Turn right, walk forward to the sofa, then turn right and walk across the room to the plant, then turn left and walk to the remote control on the dresser on the right.
Pick up the remote control from the dresser.
Turn around and walk forward to the coffee table.
Put the remote control on the coffee table, in front of the back of the laptop.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote control from a dresser to a coffee table.

high_descs: turn right, walk forward, turn right before the couch, walk forward past couches, turn left, take a few steps, turn right to face the dresser
pick up the remote that is on the dresser
turn left, walk forward, turn left, walk forward, turn left to face coffee table
put the remote on the coffee table
tasks.task_desc: move the remote from the dresser to the coffee table

high_descs: Move back then right then left facing the large wooden end table against the wall
Pick up the clear grey vase on the end table
Carry the clear grey vase over to the small wooden side table where the plant is
Place the vase on the far left side on top of the wood table
tasks.task_desc: Move a vase to a different table

high_descs: Turn left, take a right at the couch, turn left and walk to the large wooden bench on the right.
Pick up the large gray vase from the bench.
Turn around and walk to the small wooden table on the left.
Put the vase on the left side of the table.
tasks.task_desc: Place a vase on a table.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the couch then turn right and walk to the wooden end table then take a step to your left.
Pick up the clear vase that's in front of you.
Take a step to your right to face the end table to the right again.
Put the vase on the stand to the left of the plant.
tasks.task_desc: Put a vase on the stand.

high_descs: Walk straight to the wall and then veer right all the way to the window.
Pick up the pitcher on the floor.
Turn around and walk to the wall, then turn around and veer right to the coffee table.
Place the pitcher on the coffee table to the right of the statue.
tasks.task_desc: Place a pitcher on a coffee table.

high_descs: Walk to small wooden table, turn right, walk to the window.
Pick up the teapot from floor in front of the window
Turn right, turn right again, walk to past couch and coffee table, turn left to face table, walk to table.
Put teapot on the table beside the laptop.
tasks.task_desc: Put teapot on the coffee table.

high_descs: Head straight, turn right, head to the window
Take the white watering can from the window sill
Turn around, head across the room
Put the watering can on the coffee table
tasks.task_desc: Take the watering can from the window sill, put it on the coffee table

high_descs: Turn around, walk forward slightly, then turn right and walk to the empty box on the chair, then turn right and walk to the book on the coffee table.
Pick up the book from the coffee table.
Turn around towards the sofa.
Put the book on the sofa, to the left of the pillow.
tasks.task_desc: Move a book from a coffee table to a sofa.

high_descs: turn right, go around coffee table to book on coffee table
pick up book from coffee table
turn around, face couch
place book on couch to the left of pillow on couch
tasks.task_desc: place book on couch

high_descs: Turn around, head to the chair on the right and walk to the front of the wooden coffee table on the right.
Pick up the green book from the left side of the coffee table.
Turn around to face the gray couch.
Put the book on the left side of the middle cushion of the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Place a book on a couch.

high_descs: Take a large step to your left.
Pick up the book entitled "The Effective Engineer" that's to the left of the laptop.
Turn around to face the couch.
Put the book on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on the couch.

high_descs: Turn left then head to the center table
Pick up the book at the center table
Turn left face the sofa
Put the book on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the book from the center table going to the sofa

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the fireplace, then turn right and walk up to the coffee table.
Pick up the book off of the coffee table.
Walk up to the couch behind you.
Put the book on the seat of the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Move a book from the coffee table to the couch.

high_descs: Move to the end table to the right of the recycle bin
Pick up green vase from the end table
Move to the coffee table behind you in front of the couch
Place vase on to the coffee table
Move to the left side of the dresser to the left of you
Pick up golden disk from off the dresser
Move the coffee table behind you in front of the couch
Place disk on to the coffee table
tasks.task_desc: Put a green vase and golden disk onto the coffee table.

high_descs: Turn around, head straight towards the wall, turn left towards the wall, turn right and find the small table.
Pick up the green vase on the table.
Turn around towards the table with the laptop.
Place the vase next to the laptop.
Turn around and walk towards the tv stand.
Pick up the gold top from the stand.
Turn around and walk towards the table.
Place the gold top to the right of the book on the table.
tasks.task_desc: Place the vase and gold top on the table in front of the sofa.

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk over to a dresser.
Pick up a green bowl from the dresser.
Turn left, then left again and walk towards a coffee table.
Place the bowl on the coffee table.
Turn to your left, then walk back over to the dresser.
Pick up a gold pot from the dresser.
Turn left and walk back over to the coffee table.
Place the pot on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bowl and a pot onto a coffee table.
